title: Old Judge Cabinets For Sale: Anson, Brouthers
author: Archive

posts.post_title: Old Judge Cabinets For Sale: Anson, Brouthers
posts.post_content:
Posted By: javan brigham
Offering for sale 2 lower grade OJ cabinets, Anson and Brouthers (Boston batting). Both have the Old Judge advertising trimmed from the bottom. The Brouthers is Gd-VG (other than trimming) with a beautiful photo-$1650 shipped. The Anson has a pin-hole at the very top, tiny corner crease at lower left, and small paper loss at the top 2 corners on the blank back, but very good contrast for an Anson-$3950 shipped. Scans upon request. Plenty of N54 and ebay references.
